channel.title: Edititing Shop Prices?
channel.description:
Anyone tell me how to edit the shop prices, example, making a d chain 10mil instead of 160k or a Party hat 100mil instead of 20gp?
Also if there is a way to make more space, as in putting up more items in the General store or in another store, then please help me. For Example: There is usually a Pot, Jug, Shears, Bucket, Bowl, Cake Tin, Tinderbox, Chisel, Hammer, and a Newcomers Map in the Varrock General Store. How would i make it be Phat Set, H'Ween Set, Santa, Alot of Weapons, ECT without the game disconnecting right as i Login.
I will be willing to pay a Fee as in 500K-1M to the person who can help me with 1 of the 2 things, as I will be quitting Runescape for awhile for the time to take time in making me a Private Server, all Help appreciated.
Thanks. :)

item.title: Edititing Shop Prices?
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

Like in Varrock General store, If i try to add more items than it freezes like…umm

Read my post 1, there are like 10 items already in General store that dont go away, if i try to add an extra item, it disconnects me everytime i login. Get it now :?

Read full topic

item.title: Edititing Shop Prices?
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

Im going to search every file then i guess :[br][size=1]Posted at: August 10, 2006, 07:32:28 PM[/size][hr]By searching the threads i got the price changing to work…now the shop space, 1Mil to whomever helps me, 1Mil in RS2 GP

Read full topic

Like search every folder and search for the itemID? I was thinking the prices would be in Item.cfg, but the prices don’t match

@Bdawg wrote:

I dunno my guess is do a Java Search for the Item and then try and find a match with a price… Then change it. Same thign with Stats Jah.
